title: WTB: Mordecai Brown (Chicago) Sweet Cap. 460/42 Over Print
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: WTB: Mordecai Brown (Chicago) Sweet Cap. 460/42 Over Print
posts.post_content:
Looking for the last of these Sweet Caporal cards for my collection.  I still need the Mordecai Brown Sweet Caporal 350-460 factory 42OP card.  I just picked up a 350 factory 30 not pictured, but now these 4 are getting lonely without their missing factory 42OP brother!

Though I would like to find in similar condition, it is not completely necessary, would like to find something in Good or better condition though.

PM or email me with anything that you may have for sale [url]Asmusstephen@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks,
Steve
